item.field: Some returning combat veterans suffer scars that are more psychological than physical. This film follows patients and staff during their treatment.
Edward G. Robinson, Loretta Young, Orson Welles, Philip Merivale, Richard Long, Konstantin Shayne, Byron Keith, Billy House
A Nazi fugitive hiding in Connecticut tries to keep his identity hidden from his na√Øve new wife while a dogged investigator pursues him relentlessly.
